target: TEXT_CLSWDK010_00539_SEQ_00<tab>木工師ギルドのベアティヌが、取り乱しているようだ。

source: TEXT_CLSWDK010_00539_SEQ_01<tab>Beatin has been inconsolable since the discovery of Gairhard's broken bow. Believing his dear friend to be deceased, he asks that you give him time to be alone. Speak with Nicoliaux and see if he has any ideas as to how you can comfort the timbermaster.
target: TEXT_CLSWDK010_00539_SEQ_01<tab>ベアティヌから依頼を受けた。グリダニアのどんぐり遊園にいる「ニコリオー」と話そう。

source: TEXT_CLSWDK010_00539_SEQ_02<tab>Nicoliaux tells you of how the timbermaster flew into a terrible rage upon receiving word of Gairhard's presumed death, breaking anything within reach with his bare hands. Although Nicoliaux believes the situation to be hopeless, he suggests that you present a length of high-quality rosewood lumber to Beatin, in an effort to distract the timbermaster with work.
target: TEXT_CLSWDK010_00539_SEQ_02<tab>ニコリオーと話した。グリダニアの木工師ギルドにいる「ベアティヌ」に「<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) ((　5376)) 01 /var>」を1個見せよう。

source: TEXT_CLSWDK010_00539_SEQ_03<tab>Your attempt to distract Beatin unexpectedly triggers the revelation that Gairhard and his squad must still be alive. However, the timbermaster fears that his friend is in dire need of assistance. Unable to grip a saw due to the injuries he incurred while rampaging through the workshop, he asks you to craft a quality crab bow and meld to it a grade three savage aim materia. Once you have prepared the bow, track down Gairhard in the North Shroud and see that he receives the help he needs.
target: TEXT_CLSWDK010_00539_SEQ_03<tab>ベアティヌに<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) ((　5376)) 01 /var>を見せた。北部森林の「ゲイルハード」に「<var 28 ((Item)) ((　5671)) 01 /var>」のついた「<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) ((　1942)) 01 /var>」を1個納品しよう。

source: TEXT_CLSWDK010_00539_SEQ_04<tab>You fortuitously stumble upon Gairhard's squad, which is locked in battle with the Ixal. Amazed by the inexplicable appearance of a carpenter in the middle of a battlefield, he is shocked to receive the crab bow. After sparing the briefest of thanks, he turns his attention to the Ixal and promptly slays their leader with a single arrow. Their forces in disarray, the Ixal are forced to retreat. Return to Gridania and inform Beatin of all that has transpired.
target: TEXT_CLSWDK010_00539_SEQ_04<tab>ゲイルハードに<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) ((　1942)) 01 /var>を納品した。グリダニアの木工師ギルドにいる「ベアティヌ」に報告しよう。

source:
TEXT_CLSWDK010_00539_SEQ_05Beatin thanks you profusely for saving Gairhard's life, and states that he owes you a debt that can never be repaid. He furthermore declares that you have grown into a master artisan, and that he has nothing else to teach you. Inspired by your example, the timbermaster resolves to refine his own skills, and wishes you luck in your never-ending journey to become a better carpenter.

※The next carpenter quest will be available from Beatin once you have completed the main scenario quest “Before the Dawn.”
target:
TEXT_CLSWDK010_00539_SEQ_05ベアティヌに報告した。ゲイルハードの勝利を聞き、喜ぶベアティヌ。冒険者のお陰で、ベアティヌ自身も成長できたという。木工師としての成長は、日々続くと語るベアティヌ。彼の言葉を胸に、これからも腕を磨いてゆこう。

※以下の条件を満たすと、木工師ギルドのベアティヌから、新たなクラスクエストを受注することができます。
1.「メインクエスト：第七星暦ストーリー」の、
　「希望の灯火」を完了する。

source: TEXT_CLSWDK010_00539_TODO_01<tab>Present a length of rosewood lumber <var 28 ((Addon)) 0A01 /var> to Beatin.
target: TEXT_CLSWDK010_00539_TODO_01<tab>ベアティヌに<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) F11501 /var>を見せる

source: TEXT_CLSWDK010_00539_TODO_02<tab>Deliver a crab bow <var 28 ((Addon)) 0A01 /var> melded with a savage aim materia III to Gairhard in the North Shroud.
target: TEXT_CLSWDK010_00539_TODO_02<tab>北部森林のゲイルハードに依頼品を納品
TEXT_CLSWDK010_00539_TODO_03<tab>木工師ギルドのベアティヌに報告

source: TEXT_CLSWDK010_00539_BEATINE_000_001<tab>Oh, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! It's horrible! It's so horrible!
target:
TEXT_CLSWDK010_00539_BEATINE_000_001)) (( )) 02 /var>さん……！
た、大変です……どうしましょう……どうしたら……！

source: TEXT_CLSWDK010_00539_BEATINE_000_002<tab>An officer from the Adders' Nest came to speak with me. In the North Shroud, near Ixali territory, they...they found...
target:
TEXT_CLSWDK010_00539_BEATINE_000_002そ……「双蛇党」統合司令部に、
戦場で回収された、壊れた武器が届いたんですが……
その……その中に……

source: TEXT_CLSWDK010_00539_BEATINE_000_004<tab>I saw the fragments myself. It was the selfsame maple longbow I made all those years ago. Which means...
target:
TEXT_CLSWDK010_00539_BEATINE_000_004私が作ったものです……見間違うはずありません……！
戦場で武器を手放せば、どういうことになるか……
ああ……

source: TEXT_CLSWDK010_00539_BEATINE_000_006<tab>I wish to be alone right now, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Go... Be with your loved ones, or play with the younglings in the Acorn Orchard.
target:
TEXT_CLSWDK010_00539_BEATINE_000_006ううぅ……すみません……ひとりにしてください……
どんぐり遊園で「ニコリオー」の相手でも
してあげてください……。

source: TEXT_CLSWDK010_00539_NICOLIAUX_000_010<tab>Hey, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. It's good you weren't here earlier when Beatin heard the news. He went on a rampage in the workshop, howling like an animal and breaking anything within reach with his bare hands!
target:
TEXT_CLSWDK010_00539_NICOLIAUX_000_010先生、また、落ち込んでるんだな。
でも、今回は僕らじゃどうしようもないよ。
自分で立ち直らなきゃいけないんだ。

source: TEXT_CLSWDK010_00539_NICOLIAUX_000_011<tab>I don't think we can help him this time... But if you want to try, you could give him some really, <var 1A 02 /var>really<var 1A 01 /var> good wood─like, say, the <var 1A 02 /var>best<var 1A 01 /var> length of rosewood lumber you can make. Maybe that would work?
target:
TEXT_CLSWDK010_00539_NICOLIAUX_000_011せめて、お前が、その手伝いをしてあげてよ。
先生がちょっとでも前向きに考えられるように、
すごい「」を渡してあげて！

source: TEXT_CLSWDK010_00539_BEATINE_000_020<tab>Why...why have you returned? I told you, I wish to be alone.
target: TEXT_CLSWDK010_00539_BEATINE_000_020<tab>すみません……ひとりにしてください……。

source: TEXT_CLSWDK010_00539_BEATINE_000_022<tab>This is an exquisite length of rosewood lumber. Truly, the culmination of decades of growth and maturation...
target:
TEXT_CLSWDK010_00539_BEATINE_000_022フゥ……素晴らしい……。
あなたは、私の知らぬ間に、成長して……

source: TEXT_CLSWDK010_00539_BEATINE_000_023<tab><sigh> I know you mean well, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, but it is no use. My thoughts remain with Gairhard.
TEXT_CLSWDK010_00539_BEATINE_000_024<tab>Like a young sapling, he matured into a magnificent tree...only to be cut down before his─
target:
TEXT_CLSWDK010_00539_BEATINE_000_024人も、木も成長する……
そうです……彼だって、昔のままじゃない……

source: TEXT_CLSWDK010_00539_BEATINE_000_025<tab>...Wait, what am I saying? Gairhard was no <var 1A 02 /var>sapling<var 1A 01 /var>. He was one of our finest. And the scouts...the scouts found signs of a skirmish, but no bodies!
target: TEXT_CLSWDK010_00539_BEATINE_000_025<tab>簡単にゲイルハードが、やられるはずない……！

source: TEXT_CLSWDK010_00539_BEATINE_000_026<tab>Do you not see? He must still be alive! He and his squad are out there somewhere, isolated and likely low on supplies. I know for a fact that he only carries one bow, so if that weapon has been broken... Matron forfend, he could be defenseless!
target:
TEXT_CLSWDK010_00539_BEATINE_000_026彼はまだ、生きているかもしれません……！
ならば新しい弓を必要としている……！
ええ、そうに違いありません……！

source: TEXT_CLSWDK010_00539_BEATINE_000_027<tab>He must needs be sent a new one straightaway! But...I fear I am in no condition to craft it. In my earlier foolish tantrum, I injured my hand, and have not the strength to grip a saw.
target:
TEXT_CLSWDK010_00539_BEATINE_000_027……)) (( )) 02 /var>さん。
あなたに、お願いがあります。
私に「成長」を教えてくれた、あなたにこそ頼みたいんです。

source: TEXT_CLSWDK010_00539_BEATINE_000_028<tab><var 1A 02 /var>You<var 1A 01 /var> must be the one to craft Gairhard's bow, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I beg of you, make him a peerless crab bow and affix to it a savage aim materia of the third grade.
target:
TEXT_CLSWDK010_00539_BEATINE_000_028「」を作り、
「」を装着してください……。

source: TEXT_CLSWDK010_00539_BEATINE_000_029<tab>Once finished, seek out Gairhard and his men in the North Shroud. The fragments of his old longbow were found not far from Alder Springs. If the Matron is merciful, you will find him not far from there.
target:
TEXT_CLSWDK010_00539_BEATINE_000_029そして、その弓を……前線にいる「ゲイルハード」へ
届けてほしいのです……あなたの姿と弓で、
私のギルドマスターとしての成長を彼に示してください。

source: TEXT_CLSWDK010_00539_BEATINE_000_030<tab>Please, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. You are my one and only hope.
target:
TEXT_CLSWDK010_00539_BEATINE_000_030彼の部隊は今、北部森林にいるはずです。
手遅れにならないうちに、お願いします……！

source: TEXT_CLSWDK010_00539_GAIRHARD_000_040<tab>What do you think you're doing here!? Take cover, you fool─there are Ixal about!
target:
TEXT_CLSWDK010_00539_GAIRHARD_000_040もうダメだ……
イクサル族の部隊が、迫ってきてるってのに
俺は、あの弓がないと……

source: TEXT_CLSWDK010_00539_GAIRHARD_000_041<tab>Dammit, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, this is no place for a carpenter!
target:
TEXT_CLSWDK010_00539_GAIRHARD_000_041)) (( )) 02 /var>……！
なぜここへ……それに、この弓は……？

source: TEXT_CLSWDK010_00539_GAIRHARD_000_042<tab>A <var 1A 02 /var>bow<var 1A 01 /var>? Did Beatin send you all this way just to deliver a <var 1A 02 /var>bow<var 1A 01 /var>?
target:
TEXT_CLSWDK010_00539_GAIRHARD_000_042こ、これは……「」じゃないか！
どうして、まさかお前が……！？

source: TEXT_CLSWDK010_00539_GAIRHARD_000_043<tab>That... He... Gods bless that stubborn fool!
target:
TEXT_CLSWDK010_00539_GAIRHARD_000_043なんと、見事な弓だ……
メガロクラブの甲殻と、紅珊瑚の彩り……
手に取る者の士気を燃え立たせる、毅然とした美しさ……

source: TEXT_CLSWDK010_00539_GAIRHARD_000_044<tab>I should have listened when he said my maple longbow was at its limit.
target:
TEXT_CLSWDK010_00539_GAIRHARD_000_044見目にとどまらず、
素材のコンポジットボウの弱点である
接合部の強度を、絶妙に補強した加工も素晴らしい。

source: TEXT_CLSWDK010_00539_GAIRHARD_000_045<tab>My thanks, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. If it weren't for you, I don't know what I would've done.
target:
TEXT_CLSWDK010_00539_GAIRHARD_000_045こんな弓は、見たことがない……。
お前と……ベアティヌが届けてくれた弓……
これがあれば、俺は……！

source: TEXT_CLSWDK010_00539_GAIRHARD_000_046<tab>Now keep your head down! I've a chieftain to slay!

TEXT_CLSWDK010_00539_GAIRHARD_000_050<tab>You saved lives this <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((eve)) ((day)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((day)) ((eve)) /var>)) /var>. I cannot thank you enough, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Please let Beatin know that we are fine, and that I will see him again soon.
target:
TEXT_CLSWDK010_00539_GAIRHARD_000_050お前のおかげで勝利できた、ありがとう。
……そして、お前を導いたベアティヌにも
感謝の言葉を伝えておいてくれ。

source: TEXT_CLSWDK010_00539_BEATINE_000_050<tab>I could kiss you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! He lives! Gairhard lives!
target:
TEXT_CLSWDK010_00539_BEATINE_000_050おかえりなさい……！
彼の部隊の勝利が、このグリダニアにまで
届いていますよ……！

source: TEXT_CLSWDK010_00539_BEATINE_000_051<tab>I owe you a debt that can never be repaid. A thousand times over, I thank you.
target:
TEXT_CLSWDK010_00539_BEATINE_000_051本当に、本当によかった……。
そして、本当に、ありがとうございました。

source: TEXT_CLSWDK010_00539_BEATINE_000_052<tab>You came to us as a seedling, yet now you are as a heavenspillar. There is naught else I have to teach you.
target:
TEXT_CLSWDK010_00539_BEATINE_000_052あなたを木工師として指導するうちに……
先生も、ひとまわり成長できた……と思います……。

source: TEXT_CLSWDK010_00539_BEATINE_000_053<tab>In fact, you have inspired <var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var> to reflect on mine own deficiencies.
target:
TEXT_CLSWDK010_00539_BEATINE_000_053)) (( )) 02 /var>さん……
あなたはもう、立派な大木です。
私からお教えできることは、もうありませんが……

source: TEXT_CLSWDK010_00539_BEATINE_000_054<tab>Minor though they may be, I would be remiss if I neglected personal development. Though you are no longer under my tutelage, I trust you will continue to hone your craft as well. Best of luck to you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target:
TEXT_CLSWDK010_00539_BEATINE_000_054お互い、木工師である限り、成長し続けましょう……。
これからも腕を磨いていきましょうね……フフ、フ……！

source: TEXT_CLSWDK010_00539_SYSTEM_000_500<tab>This concludes the carpenter quests for FINAL FANTASY XIV: A Realm Reborn. In order to undertake the next series of quests, you must first meet the following requirements:
target:
TEXT_CLSWDK010_00539_SYSTEM_000_500「木工師」の物語が、ひとつの区切りを迎えました！
次の「木工師」のクラスクエストを開始するためには、
以下の条件を満たす必要があります。

source: TEXT_CLSWDK010_00539_SYSTEM_000_501<tab>※ You must have completed the main scenario quest “Before the Dawn.”
target:
TEXT_CLSWDK010_00539_SYSTEM_000_5011.「メインクエスト：第七星暦ストーリー」の、
　「希望の灯火」を完了する。

source: TEXT_CLSWDK010_00539_SYSTEM_000_502<tab>Once you have done so, the next carpenter quest will be available from Beatin.
target:
TEXT_CLSWDK010_00539_SYSTEM_000_502条件を満たし、木工師ギルドの、
「ベアティヌ」に話しかけ、
新たなクラスクエストを開始しましょう！
